name: Single filer at median income in Zürich (2026)
description: Standard case for single person earning CHF 80,000 in Zürich canton

sources.description: Calculated using official 2026 federal tax brackets. Minor adjustment to top bracket threshold vs 2025. Married deduction increased to CHF 2,800 (no effect here). Federal tax ~976 CHF on taxable income of ~69,880. Cantonal/Municipal at 12% for Zurich mid-income. Social 6.4%.
